trans-unit.source: Represents a pop-up window that has content.
trans-unit.target: 表示具有內容的快顯視窗。

trans-unit.source: **Content Model**: Popup has one content property: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Child%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **內容模型**︰ 快顯視窗具有一個內容屬性︰ <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Child%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Child%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Popup can have a maximum of one child, which can be any <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 快顯視窗的最大的一個子系，可以是任何<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>可

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a Popup control that has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> as its parent.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示具有 Popup 控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>做為其父系。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: ![Popup illustration](~/add/media/popuppicture.JPG "Popup illustration") You can position a popup by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: ![Popup 圖例](~/add/media/popuppicture.JPG "Popup 圖例")您可以藉由設定放置在快顯<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快顯視窗放置行為](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: When Popup is displayed on the screen, it does not reposition itself if its parent is repositioned.
trans-unit.target: 在螢幕上顯示快顯視窗時，它不會不重新置放本身如果其父代重新調整位置。

trans-unit.source: A Popup displays its content in its own window on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 快顯視窗在螢幕上視窗中顯示其內容。

trans-unit.source: A Popup control supports animation when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A> property is set to `true` and the application is running with full trust.
trans-unit.target: Popup 控制項支援動畫時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A>屬性設定為`true`和應用程式以完全信任執行。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application that is running with full trust has complete access to system resources and is typically installed on the user's system.
trans-unit.target: 以完全信任執行的應用程式具有完整存取權的系統資源，通常會安裝在使用者的系統。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see[Security (WPF)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[安全性 (WPF)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For bitmap and opacity effects to appear on the content of a Popup, you must set the effects directly on the Popup content.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示在快顯視窗的內容上的點陣圖和不透明度效果，您必須設定直接在快顯功能表上的效果內容。

trans-unit.source: The content of a Popup does not inherit effects that are set on the Popup control or on any other element that is in the parent window.
trans-unit.target: 快顯視窗的內容不會繼承 Popup 控制項或任何其他項目在父視窗中設定的效果。

trans-unit.source: A Popup is sized to its content by default.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，快顯視窗會調整成其內容。

trans-unit.source: When this occurs, applying a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderTransform%2A> or bitmap effects may cause the Popup to be obscured.
trans-unit.target: 當發生這種情況，套用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderTransform%2A>或點陣圖效果可能會造成快顯 以會變模糊。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderTransform%2A>

trans-unit.source: This occurs because the default size of the content does not provide enough area for the effects to display.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為內容的預設大小不會提供足夠的顯示效果的區域。

trans-unit.source: If more space is required, you can define a margin around the Popup content to increase the area that is available to the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要更多空間，您可以定義要增加可用的控制項區域的快顯視窗內容周圍的邊界。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A> property must be set on the Popup when used in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A>屬性必須設定在快顯視窗中使用時[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a tooltip, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> classes.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立工具提示，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ToolTip Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[工具提示概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control can contain transparent content.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>控制項可以包含透明的內容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control can only contain transparent content when the application runs with full trust.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>以完全信任的應用程式執行時，控制項只可以包含透明的內容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: An application that runs with full trust has complete access to system resources and is typically installed on the local system.
trans-unit.target: 以完全信任執行的應用程式具有完整存取權的系統資源，通常會安裝在本機系統。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see[Security (WPF)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[安全性 (WPF)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set to `true` when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> is hosted in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不能設定為`true`時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>裝載於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: If the AllowsTransparency property is set to `true` in an application that does not run in full trust, the AllowsTransparency property value is changed to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 AllowsTransparency 屬性設為`true`AllowsTransparency 屬性值變更為不會在完全信任中執行的應用程式，在`false`。

trans-unit.source: An application that is hosted in a browser is an example of an application that does not run in full trust.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器裝載應用程式是不會在完全信任中執行的應用程式的範例。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的內容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: **Content Model**: The Child property is the only content property for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: **內容模型**: 子屬性是只包含內容屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> can only have one <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> as a child, but that child can contain complex embedded content.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>只能有一個<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>為子系，但子系可以包含複雜的內嵌的內容。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: For example, the child can be a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> that contains an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>, text, and other types of controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以是子系<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>、 文字和其他類型的控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: When content is added to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control becomes the logical parent to the content.
trans-unit.target: 當將內容新增至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控制項，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>就會在控制項邏輯父代的內容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> content is considered to be the logical child of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>內容會被視為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>的邏輯子系</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: The child content is not added to the visual tree that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: 子內容不會加入至視覺化樹狀結構，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the child content is rendered in a separate window with its own visual tree when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，在不同的視窗具有自己的視覺呈現子內容樹狀結構時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>設`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>

trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>開啟和關閉切換<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 將附加的子項目<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You might want to create a custom control that has the same functionality as an existing control and also exhibits the behavior of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: 您可能想要建立具有相同的功能，為現有的控制項，同時也會展示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>行為的自訂控制項

trans-unit.source: You can make your control behave like a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> by adding a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> to your control and calling the CreateRootPopup method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以讓控制項的行為與相同<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控制項，然後呼叫 CreateRootPopup 方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: This method assigns `child` to the child property and binds the following properties to `child`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將指派`child`子屬性並將下列屬性的繫結`child`。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.CustomPopupPlacementCallback%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset%2A> You should implement these as dependency properties in your control so it can be used the same way as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.CustomPopupPlacementCallback%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>-<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset%2A>您應該實作這些相依性屬性，因此可以用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>一樣的方式在控制項中</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.CustomPopupPlacementCallback%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Custom Dependency Properties](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[自訂相依性屬性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫 CreateRootPopup，`child`不可<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>的子系

trans-unit.target: 此外，`PlacementTarget`之前呼叫這個方法應該設在您的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that you can use to access the logical child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得可用來存取的邏輯子元素的列舉值<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When you add content to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control becomes the logical parent to the content.
trans-unit.target: 當您將內容加入到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控制項，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>就會在控制項邏輯父代的內容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> content is considered to be the logical child of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>內容會被視為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>的邏輯子系</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: The child content is not added to the visual tree that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: 子內容不會加入至視覺化樹狀結構，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the child content is rendered in a separate window that has its own visual tree when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，在不同的視窗有它自己的 visual 轉譯子內容樹狀結構時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>屬性設定為`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control closes when the control is no longer in focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>控制會關閉，不再焦點在控制項時。

trans-unit.source: When the StaysOpen property is set to `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> stays open until it is explicitly closed by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 當 StaysOpen 屬性設定為`true`，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>保持開啟，直到它已明確關閉藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>屬性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: When StaysOpen is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control intercepts all mouse and keyboard events to determine when one of these events occurs outside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: StaysOpen 時`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控制會攔截所有的滑鼠和鍵盤事件以判斷其中一個事件發生外部<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.

trans-unit.source: For example, a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值為`1`是可接受。
